canvases.label: Vestigia delle Terme di Tito e Loro Interne Pitture, pl.32

metadata.value: Vestigia delle Terme di Tito e Loro Interne Pitture
metadata.label: Title

metadata.value: Carloni was committed to producing images of the freizes of the Domus Aurea Neronis, which is seen here. This image is of workers with their ox which carry food in a carraige, surrounded by a frame of sea creatures, birds and human figures. http://discovered.ed.ac.uk/primo_library/libweb/action/display.do?tabs=detailsTab&ct=display&fn=search&doc=44UOE_ALMA21112470230002466&indx=1&recIds=44UOE_ALMA21112470230002466&recIdxs=0&elementId=0&renderMode=poppedOut&displayMode=full&frbrVersion=&submit=Search&query=any%2Ccontains%2CRECA.FF.328&vl%288819882UI0%29=any&search_scope=default_scope&dscnt=0&scp.scps=scope%3A%2844UOE_DSPACE%29%2Cscope%3A%2844UOE_PURE%29%2Cscope%3A%2844UOE_ALMA%29%2Cprimo_central_multiple_fe&onCampus=false&vid=44UOE_VU1&institution=44UOE&bulkSize=10&highlight=true&tab=default_tab&dym=true&displayField=title&vl%28freeText0%29=RECA.FF.328&dstmp=1453807018382
metadata.label: Description

metadata.value: Binding: eighteenth-century quarter Russia leather, with blue paper over boards. Gilt-tooled bands of ornament and title on spine. Blue leather label with frame of ornaments and title on boards. Both titles: "Terme di Tito"

canvases.label: Vestigia delle Terme di Tito e Loro Interne Pitture, pl.44

metadata.value: Vestigia delle Terme di Tito e Loro Interne Pitture
metadata.label: Title

metadata.value: Carloni was committed to producing images of the freizes of the Domus Aurea Neronis, which is seen here. This etching contains mnay images of gods, humans and animals, all ornamented and seperated by decoration. Differing from the 'framework' of the other freize, this piece is decorated in a way that resembles molding or physical barriers. http://discovered.ed.ac.uk/primo_library/libweb/action/display.do?tabs=detailsTab&ct=display&fn=search&doc=44UOE_ALMA21112470230002466&indx=1&recIds=44UOE_ALMA21112470230002466&recIdxs=0&elementId=0&renderMode=poppedOut&displayMode=full&frbrVersion=&submit=Search&query=any%2Ccontains%2CRECA.FF.328&vl%288819882UI0%29=any&search_scope=default_scope&dscnt=0&scp.scps=scope%3A%2844UOE_DSPACE%29%2Cscope%3A%2844UOE_PURE%29%2Cscope%3A%2844UOE_ALMA%29%2Cprimo_central_multiple_fe&onCampus=false&vid=44UOE_VU1&institution=44UOE&bulkSize=10&highlight=true&tab=default_tab&dym=true&displayField=title&vl%28freeText0%29=RECA.FF.328&dstmp=1453807018382

canvases.label: Vestigia delle Terme di Tito e Loro Interne Pitture, pl.2

metadata.value: Vestigia delle Terme di Tito e Loro Interne Pitture
metadata.label: Title

metadata.value: Originally mistaken for images of the Bath's of Titus, these etchings are actually of drawings by V. Brenna and F. Smuglewicz which depict the the Domus Aurea Neronis. This etching is of a scene of the outside of the ruins. On the large rock to the right there is the inscription 'Vestigia Delle Terme Di Tito E Loro Interne Pittvre' and at the bottom of this image and the others in the book is the phrase 'Presso Ludovico Mirri Mercante de (d') Quadri incontro al Palazzo Bernini a Roma'. http://discovered.ed.ac.uk/primo_library/libweb/action/display.do?tabs=detailsTab&ct=display&fn=search&doc=44UOE_ALMA21112470230002466&indx=1&recIds=44UOE_ALMA21112470230002466&recIdxs=0&elementId=0&renderMode=poppedOut&displayMode=full&frbrVersion=&submit=Search&query=any%2Ccontains%2CRECA.FF.328&vl%288819882UI0%29=any&search_scope=default_scope&dscnt=0&scp.scps=scope%3A%2844UOE_DSPACE%29%2Cscope%3A%2844UOE_PURE%29%2Cscope%3A%2844UOE_ALMA%29%2Cprimo_central_multiple_fe&onCampus=false&vid=44UOE_VU1&institution=44UOE&bulkSize=10&highlight=true&tab=default_tab&dym=true&displayField=title&vl%28freeText0%29=RECA.FF.328&dstmp=1453807018382
